title: Ron Stump Special Opportunity Fund
description: To provide financial support to students who demonstrate a need relating to their educational experience due to an unforeseen circumstance or event at the discretion of the Vice Chancellor for Student Affairs (or his/her designee) at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide financial support to students who demonstrate a need relating to their educational experience due to an unforeseen circumstance or event at the discretion of the Vice Chancellor for Student Affairs (or his/her designee) at CU Boulder.
